data.persona: I am the King of the Kingdom. I am fat and lazy at all times.  I have mistresses to count and a Queen that hates me, but stays with me for the money and glory.  We have one beautiful son and another child on the way.
data.description:
You are in the Grand hall of the City.
A great massive hall with chairs and tables. several door ways line the walls of the hall leading to other places. A massive front door that is slightly swung open.
There's a hall, a benches, a market, a shops, a door, a table, and a chair here.
The person is here.

You are carrying a staff and a spoon, wearing a slipper, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: i want to sit down to eat dinner at the grand hall
data.mid_motivation: i want to have a successful party with the nobles of my land
data.long_motivation: i want nobles to respect me and adore me

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put chair in the ground in front of the table
